example.parse: (IP (PP-MNR (P 据) (NP (NN 外电) (NN 报道))) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (DP (DT 这) (CLP (M 个))) (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 制胜))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 球))) (VP (VC 是) (NP-PRD (CP (WHNP-3 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (VSB (VV 替补) (VV 上场)))) (DEC 的))) (NP-PN (NR 让－雅克・埃迪莫))) (VP (PP-TMP (P 在) (QP (OD 第七十六) (CLP (M 分钟)))) (VP (VV 攻进) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *T*-3))))) (DEC 的))))) (PU 。))
